title: Nina Turner Launches Organization to Support Striking Workers
description:
The former Ohio state senator and Bernie Sanders surrogate said she was inspired by the nearly two-year-long Alabama coal miners strike.

The post Nina Turner Launches Organization to Support Striking Workers appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Azerbaijan War on Armenians in Nagorno-Karabakh Forcibly Displaced Tens of Thousands
description:
Control over Nagorno-Karabakh sits at the center of a shifting geopolitical landscape and an emerging Cold War 2.0.

The post Azerbaijan War on Armenians in Nagorno-Karabakh Forcibly Displaced Tens of Thousands appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Laphonza Butler’s EMILY’s List Spends Millions on Kamala Harris While Laying Off Grassroots Staff
description:
Two months before the layoffs, EMILY’s List announced a 2024 plan to spend tens of millions of dollars to back Kamala Harris, a Butler ally.

The post Laphonza Butler’s EMILY’s List Spends Millions on Kamala Harris While Laying Off Grassroots Staff appeared first on The Intercept.
